summary.name: Summary
summary.content: Strategic operations leader who thrives at the intersection of product, technology, and business. I partner with executive leadership to turn vision into execution through cross-functional collaboration, systematic process design, and data-driven decision-making. With a strong technical foundation and 10+ years bridging product, engineering, and business teams, I translate complex challenges into actionable plans, design systems that enable teams to scale, and drive high-impact strategic initiatives in fast-paced environments.

items.summary: Led product optimization initiatives that reduced release cycles by 90% during post-acquisition transformation, designing collaborative frameworks that aligned product, engineering, design, and business teams across global markets.
highlights: Acted as bridge between leadership vision and team execution, translating strategic priorities into operational plans and ensuring cross-functional alignment.
Drove company-wide design system adoption as strategic project owner, coordinating across product, engineering, and design to improve UX consistency and accelerate feature launches.
Designed collaborative frameworks and operational processes that enabled distributed teams to work effectively across time zones, improving communication clarity and decision-making speed.
Standardized agile practices and optimized workflows to improve team productivity and cross-functional alignment.
items.note: Note: After completing this role in December 2024, I took a structured career break to focus on German language acquisition (B1) and strategic career development.

items.summary: Led product management for marketing-facing tools at Unbabel's AI translation platform, managing roadmap prioritization and cross-functional collaboration across design, engineering, and business teams.
highlights: Managed roadmap for marketing-facing tools, delivering 10+ features that drove 40% growth in new business through collaborative prioritization sessions that balanced technical feasibility with business goals.
Optimized release workflows and CI/CD processes, achieving 4× increase in deployment speed and enabling rapid experimentation and iteration.
Led product discovery initiatives, conducting user research and translating customer insights into actionable product requirements that informed roadmap decisions.

items.summary: Defined and executed growth strategy to scale the Landing.jobs marketplace, driving user acquisition and retention through Product-Led Growth.
highlights: Led growth initiatives, achieving 100%+ annual user growth through data-driven experiments, multi-channel acquisition, and systematic optimization.
Conducted 100+ user interviews to identify friction points and inform product roadmap, resulting in measurable improvements in activation and retention.
